TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MissingMethodException extends System.MissingMemberException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 嘗試動態存取不存在的方法時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when there is an attempt to dynamically access a method that does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果程式碼嘗試存取的類別不存在的方法，通常會產生編譯錯誤。Normally a compilation error is generated if code attempts to access a nonexistent method of a class. 被設計來處理嘗試對動態存取不依強式名稱參考的組件重新命名或刪除方法的情況。 is designed to handle cases where an attempt is made to dynamically access a renamed or deleted method of an assembly that is not referenced by its strong name. 相依組件中的程式碼嘗試存取已修改的組件中遺漏的方法時，會擲回。 is thrown when code in a dependent assembly attempts to access a missing method in an assembly that was modified. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGMETHOD，具有 0x80131513 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGMETHOD, that has the value 0x80131513. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. > [!NOTE] > 這個例外狀況不會包含在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或，但它的某些成員所擲回。This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the , but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在此情況下攔截例外狀況，請撰寫`catch`陳述式改為。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for instead. ## Examples 此範例顯示如果您嘗試使用反映來呼叫不存在的方法，會發生什麼事及存取不存在的欄位。This example shows what happens if you attempt to use reflection to call a method that does not exist and access a field that does not exist. 應用程式復原藉由捕捉， ，和。The application recovers by catching the , , and . [!code-cpp[MissingMethodException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/cpp/MissingMethodException.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MissingMethodException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/CS/MissingMethodException.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MissingMethodException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/vb/missingmethodexception.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 嘗試存取遺漏的方法。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to access a missing method." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容`message`參數應該是讓使用者能夠讀懂。The content of the `message` parameter should be understandable by the user. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

Public Sub New (className As String, methodName As String)

param.name: className
param.span: 類別名稱，嘗試在該類別中存取不存在的方法。

span.span: The name of the class in which access to a nonexistent method was attempted.
The name of the method that cannot be accessed.

summary.span: 使用指定的類別名稱和方法名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified class name and method name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示類別名稱、方法名稱和遺漏方法簽章的文字字串。

span.span: Gets the text string showing the class name, the method name, and the signature of the missing method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定類別名稱，物件建構時，會傳回繼承自基底類別的預設文字字串。If the class name is not specified when the object is constructed, the default text string inherited from the base class is returned. 這個屬性會覆寫。This property overrides . 應該當地語系化的錯誤訊息。The error message should be localized. ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MissingMethodException#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/cpp/MissingMethodException.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MissingMethodException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/CS/MissingMethodException.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MissingMethodException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/vb/missingmethodexception.vb#2)]
